title: WordPress.com Site
description: Your own space to create posts and pages with basic customization.

title: Custom site address
description: Make your site easier to find and easier to remember.

1.title: Media storage
1.description: Upload up to 3GB of photos, videos, or music.

1009.title: Media storage
1009.description: Upload up to 6GB of photos, videos, or music.

1003.title: Expanded media storage
1003.description: Upload up to 13GB of photos, videos, or music.

1008.title: Unlimited media storage
1008.description: You can upload unlimited photos, videos, or music.

title: No ads
description: WordPress.com ads will not display on your site.

title: Custom fonts, colors, & CSS
description: Change your theme's font, colors, and CSS for a unique look

title: Video storage & hosting
description: Upload and host videos on your site without advertising.

title: Unlimited Premium Themes
description: Exclusive access to our best themes. Try as many as you like.

title: Google Analytics
description: Google Analytics is a free service that offers a complementary view of your traffic to our built-in Stats feature.

title: Support
description: For those times when you can't find an answer on our Support site

1.title: Community support
1.description: Ask our Happiness Engineers questions in this app, or find answers in our community forum.

1009.title: Priority support
1009.description: Ask our Happiness Engineers questions in this app anytime you need, or at WordPress.com/help

1003.title: Priority support
1003.description: Ask our Happiness Engineers questions in this app anytime you need, or at WordPress.com/help

1008.title: Live chat support
1008.description: Ask our Happiness Engineers questions in this app anytime you need, or chat with us live at WordPress.com/help
